item.title: Understanding DNS and Root DNS: How They Work, Their Importance, and Troubleshooting Guidance
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.category: "DNS basics" , "Root DNS" , "Domain Name System" , "DNS resolution" , "DNS hierarchy" , "DNS caching" , "DNS troubleshooting" , "DNS records" , "DNS management" , "DNS commands"
item.description: Explore the working principles of DNS and Root DNS, their hierarchical structure, resolution process, caching mechanisms, and troubleshooting tips.
